issues.businessImpact: 60% of restaurant orders come from mobile - this is costing you sales

opportunities: Competitors rank higher for delivery keywords

recommendations: Not appearing for "pizza near me", "pizza", "best pizza Waterbury", "pizza delivery near me", "pizza Waterbury Connecticut", "top pizza Waterbury", "pizza restaurant near me", "pizza food Waterbury" - optimize Google My Business profile with these keywords
Low Local Pack visibility (0%) - audit your Google My Business completeness, categories, and local citations

reviews.text: Lunch deal 10$ this super buttery cheesy grilled cheese and chicken orzo soup amazing !!! Delicious and cheap !! It comes with a tiny coleslaw too but that taste tester was bomb and very good . The soup also came with sliced homemade bread I believe again very good I will try lunch here again for sure

I don‚Äôt usually leave reviews however , Pizza Castle has THE BEST PIZZA . I live in NYC and pizza is everywhere however good pizza isn‚Äôt! I cannot come to Waterbury and not have Pizza Castle. More than just pizza they are professional, helpful and personable. Spending your hard earned money should come with joy and each dollar spent here is more than worth it ! I can promise that.! CIf you still eat franchise pizza you are missing out really !!!! See ! What you waiting for order you a Large pizza from here and don‚Äôt forget your wings whichever flavor and never look back ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Food was comparable to frozen pizza and the appetizers were just the same for the price of everything I expected better. Chilies does a better job with food..I‚Äôm very disappointed in everything. The only thing that was good was the drinks we ordered from the bar.

Ordered bruschetta and there was no mention of cheese on it. It came covered in cheese. I called up and was told it was wrong on the website and there was nothing they could do. They didn‚Äôt offer to send out the correct order- just told me to take it up with DoorDash. Extremely disappointed with how I was treated. Will not be ordering from here again.

I really can‚Äôt believe people are raving about these Banquet Meal Fried Chicken wings !!!! The wings are not made fresh from a cook , they are literally frozen Banquet wings from Restaurant Depot , grocery freezer or something like that !! How can people say that these are the best in town and they are from the freezer section at Walmart!?!

editorial_summary.overview: Longtime standby serving pizza, pasta, seafood & more in muraled digs, popular for takeout.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are expressing concerns. The 2.4/5 rating from 5 recent reviews indicates significant opportunities for improvement.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the delicious and affordable lunch deal featuring a buttery cheesy grilled cheese and chicken orzo soup, which includes extras like coleslaw and homemade bread. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

Pizza Castle is praised for having the best pizza, even compared to NYC standards, and offers a joyful dining experience that makes spending money worthwhile. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The personable and professional service at Pizza Castle enhances the overall dining experience, making it a must-visit for both locals and visitors. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Incorrect menu information leading to customer dissatisfaction - review management can address this concern
Negative comparison to competitors and disappointment with food quality - social media marketing can improve this area
Negative reviews about food quality and customer service - review management can address this concern

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
